name: Project Silver
description:
A simple top-down shooter written in C++ for an university project. Battle and survive against multiple oponents in an arena.

Basic Controls:

  • WASD - Move around
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot current Weapon
  • R - Reload current Weapon
  • 1 - Switch to Pistol
  • 2 - Switch to Rifle

Advanced

  • Right Mouse Button - Use Shield
  • E - Melee attack
  • Shift - Dash
